The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 August is 58,044 (6,718.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 July, there were 2,176 new confirmed cases (251.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 July, there were 3,090 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (914 fewer cases).
